data: {"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "concept_name": "Character Role Dynamics", "type": "element", "definition": "The ecosystem of character roles—hero, villain, mentor, sidekick, foil, symbolic figure—shaping narrative energy through relationships, conflicts, evolutions, and impact on plot/theme.", "scope_notes": "Role dynamics operate at four pillars: relationships, conflicts, evolution, impact. Strength dials from low→medium→high intensity.", "axes": "pillar|intensity", "axis_values": "relationships|conflicts|evolution|impact | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "identity|drive|decision_style|backstory|change|theme", "conflicts_with": "flat_roles|filler_characters|resetting_conflicts|no_growth", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_role_dynamics_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_role_dynamics_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_relationships", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "relationships", "description": "Role relationships show bonds (love, loyalty, rivalry, dependence) that influence choices.", "detection_hint": "Look for mentor-hero bonds, villain-sidekick ties, ensemble webs.", "false_positive_risks": "Pairings with no mutual effect.", "minimal_example": "Luke and Obi-Wan shaping each other.", "counterexample": "Random mentor advice never heeded.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_conflicts", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "conflicts", "description": "Role conflicts spark tension when roles’ goals or values clash.", "detection_hint": "Hero-villain ideological battles, mentor disagreements, foil clashes.", "false_positive_risks": "Noise fights with no stakes.", "minimal_example": "Batman vs Joker ideological clash.", "counterexample": "Two heroes bickering for filler.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_evolution", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "evolution", "description": "Role evolution shifts function over time (sidekick→hero, mentor fall, villain redemption).", "detection_hint": "Track changes with cost, consistency, thematic echoes.", "false_positive_risks": "Random flip-flops with no setup.", "minimal_example": "Han Solo from rogue→hero.", "counterexample": "Villain kind one scene, evil next, no reason.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_impact", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "impact", "description": "Role dynamics drive plot beats and amplify theme.", "detection_hint": "Hero-villain clash pushes climax; subplots tie via sidekick roles.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle unrelated to theme.", "minimal_example": "Neo/Smith clash embodies freedom vs control.", "counterexample": "Big battle scene, no thematic echo.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Subtle dynamics; roles interact quietly.", "detection_hint": "Small banter, light bonds; cozy feel.", "false_positive_risks": "Flat filler with no interaction.", "minimal_example": "Mentor/student gardening in Secret Garden.", "counterexample": "Two characters share space but no bond.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Balanced dynamics; conflicts and evolutions drive subplots.", "detection_hint": "Contained clashes, small shifts.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy but inconsequential.", "minimal_example": "Woody/Buzz rivalry to friendship.", "counterexample": "Argument resolved instantly.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "signal_id": "sig_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Explosive dynamics; conflicts and evolutions reshape plot/theme.", "detection_hint": "Hero-villain showdowns, mentor betrayals.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle with reset.", "minimal_example": "Batman/Joker moral clash; Daenerys shift.", "counterexample": "Massive betrayal ignored after.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "flat_roles", "description": "Roles remain static, never influencing each other.", "tells": "Characters locked in bio labels.", "likely_causes": "Bio-style cast lists.", "corrective_feedback": "Show dynamic bonds, conflicts, shifts.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite a flat role to clash then evolve.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "filler_characters", "description": "Characters serve no plot/theme purpose.", "tells": "Subplots vanish; zero impact.", "likely_causes": "Stuffing cast for noise.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie every role to a plot beat or theme echo.", "micro_drill": "Cut or repurpose filler role.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "resetting_conflicts", "description": "Conflicts erupt then vanish with no carry-over.", "tells": "Status quo resets.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding consequence.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry tension across acts.", "micro_drill": "List 3 conflicts; show 1 unresolved later.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"concept_id": "role_dynamics", "misconception_id": "no_growth", "description": "Roles never evolve, robbing story of arc.", "tells": "Hero/villain locked forever same.", "likely_causes": "Fear of change.", "corrective_feedback": "Plan an evolution ladder.", "micro_drill": "Draft 1 role shifting in midpoint.", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_dynamics_identify_pillar_intensity", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label passage by pillar (relationship/conflict/evolution/impact) and intensity (low/med/high).", "expected_features": "Correct pillar+intensity with evidence.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate pillar+intensity with sharp evidence", "Meets": "Mostly accurate", "Developing": "Labels off or vague evidence"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: spectacle with reset.", "hint_steps": "1) What dynamic? 2) How loud?", "variation_axes": "pillar|intensity", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_dynamics_trace_evolution", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Trace a role shift across 3 beats; mark triggers and costs.", "expected_features": "Causal, consistent, thematic.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Reads inevitable with cost", "Meets": "Clear but partial", "Developing": "Loose, resets"}, "distractor_strategy": "Flip-flops with no cause.", "hint_steps": "1) Map old role 2) Event trigger 3) New role", "variation_axes": "role|cost|theme", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_dynamics_conflict_matrix", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "map", "prompt_template": "Build a conflict matrix of 2–3 role pairs with their core clashes.", "expected_features": "Conflicts specific and consequential.", "scoring_method": "matrix", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Conflicts sharp and plot-driving", "Meets": "Some relevance", "Developing": "Flat/no stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Noise fights.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick roles 2) Name value clash 3) Note consequence", "variation_axes": "role|value", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_role_dynamics_fix_filler", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Choose a filler role and tie it to plot/theme with one new dynamic.", "expected_features": "New beat integrates role.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Role integrated", "Meets": "Partial", "Developing": "Still filler"}, "distractor_strategy": "Token presence trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Find beat 2) Add consequence link", "variation_axes": "role|theme", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_1", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "relationships|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Sam’s loyalty strengthens Frodo’s resolve; ripple shifts group.", "context_tags": "fellowship|bond", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_2", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "conflicts|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Batman/Joker ideological clash sparks plot and theme.", "context_tags": "ideology|stakes", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_3", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "evolution|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Han Solo shifts rogue→hero under group influence.", "context_tags": "growth|arc", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_4", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "impact|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Neo/Smith clash embodies freedom vs control; drives climax.", "context_tags": "theme|climax", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_weak_1", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Mentor advice ignored, never shapes hero.", "context_tags": "flat_role", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_role_dynamics_weak_2", "concept_id": "role_dynamics", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Villain explodes city; next scene nobody cares.", "context_tags": "resetting_conflict", "source_file": "Character Role Dynamics 2.md", "source_md5": "5889ddc03024a73768975a09f81153b9", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:39:09.869082Z"}
